messages.subject: Re: Reincarnation and being chosen
messages.msgSnippet: Robin, I love this story. I have heard many like it from others. I voiced this same belief some months ago and nearly got my head chewed off. Be careful :)
messages.messageBody:
Robin, I love this story. I have heard many like it
from others.
I voiced this same belief some months ago and nearly
got my head chewed off. Be careful :)

Kathy


>
> I hadn't given it much thought - being "chosen" by
> my kids, but one day when
> Mackenzie was 2, he said to me "Remember that time
> when you were dressed
> like a white princess and you walked down a long
> trail with lots of people
> beside it and dad was standing on the other end, and
> I was floating on the
> ceiling and watching you?" All I can figure from
> that conversation was that
> he was present at our wedding, *years* before he was
> conceived. Asa has said
> some very similar stuff when she was a young
> toddler, she mentioned our
> wedding once too. I do believe now that they chose
> us.
>
> Blue Skies!
> -Robin-
